name: Fishly Affection
description:
It's a peaceful boring day... until a whale falls out of the sky and nearly suffocates you to death.

Weird animal alien dating game that is actually mainly just a giant shitpost full of my terrible sense of humor. There's also probably more chaos and adventuring to weird places than dating just being real here.

P.S. this is just the first part in a multi-part series, next bits should be out in the future.
